sense.def:
A stunt
je nekaj, kar nekdo naredi, da pritegne pozornost javnosti.

seg.quote: Climbing up the church tower was a fine publicity stunt.

sense.def:
A stunt
je tudi nevarno in razburljivo dejanje, ki je sestavni del snemanja filma.

seg.quote: Steve McQueen did most of his own stunts.

sense.def:
To stunt the growth or development of something
pomeni preprečiti, da bi nekaj raslo ali se razvijalo tako, kot bi se moralo.

seg.quote: These insecticides can stunt plant growth.
